articles.title: Energy giant ExxonMobil sues EU to block energy windfall tax - BBC
articles.description: The US company says the levy on its profits will discourage future investment in Europe.
articles.content:
US energy giant ExxonMobil is suing the EU in a bid to force the bloc to scrap its new windfall tax on oil firms.
A windfall tax is imposed on firms that benefitted from something they were not resp… [+1631 chars]
